Bio

I am 4th year PhD student at EECS Dept, Northwestern University. My main Research is on Computer Vision and Machine Learning and my adviser is Professor Aggelos K. Katsaggelos.

I spent two summers, 2013 and 2014, at TCL Research America in San Jose, CA as Research Intern. I worked on Face Recognition, Image Retrieval and other related areas.
